item.title: Projects
item.description: Ichor [Code] An experimental Discord bot for personal diabetes management. Paperboy [Code] A web-application that automatically aggregates, categorizes, and summarizes news articles into digestible snippets. Inspired by autotl;dr. Basically [Code] A Go library for unsupervised keyword extraction and focused text summarization. Gocha [Code] A toy real-time chat client and server using gRPC and Protobuf, with support for large batch file transfers.
